title: We have launched a beta version of our site
info: Our pizzeria 'Pizzle' has opened its site for use in beta testing mode. Soon we will open a full-fledged site.

title: Free shipping today
info: Today, all orders will be delivered free of charge in 25 minutes.

title: Even more...
info: We have added even more products to the site. Even more products, even more satisfied customers.
